7.eng-name: The Book of the Adhan (The Call to Prayer)

hadiths.text: It was narrated from Al-Aswad that Bilal said:"The final words of the Adhan are: 'Allahu Akbar, Allahu Akbar; La ilaha illallah (Allah is the Greatest, Allah is the Greatest, there is none worthy of worship except Allah)

chapter.eng-name: The Final Words Of The Adhan
